description:
Next Porto.Data meetup we will be dedicated to Microsoft Flow and PowerApps and we are happy to have a professional to talk about it. 
  
Agenda
18:50 – Welcome
19:00 – “How we use Microsoft Flow and PowerApps: Real cases scenarios” by Sandro Pereira
20:00 – Coffee break & networking
20:20 – Closing
name: Porto.Data #48 How we use Microsoft Flow and PowerApps: Real cases scenarios
